name: K9: Ultimate Police Dog Simulator
description:
Enjoy the experience of simulating a professionally trained police dog from the canine unit to chase robbers. The Police dog will be chasing thieves, robbers & criminals and also help the detective in figuring out clues by sniffing.

The K9 is also required to help the detectives by decoding the clues and use the sleuthing skills to find the robbers. The game has multiple missions for you to complete.

Assist the police force in controlling crime in the urban city.
